### Government Tender Announcement

#### Notice Details

* **Reference Number**: [WS4209712198-Doc4209752458](#)
* **Solicitation Number**: [WS4209712198](#)
* **Publication Date**: September 12, 2023
* **Tender Closig Date**: October 20, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Amendment Date**: October 16, 2023
* **Status**: Expired

#### Contract Details

* **Title**: Purchase of 2 Landing Barge Davit Systems
* **Scope of Work**: Purchase of 2 landing barge Davit systems for the Canadian Coast Guard Ship (CCGS) Pierre Radisson. The successful bidder will also have the option to purchase 4 additional identical systems for 3 other ships.
* **Contract Term**: The estimated contract term is from October 27, 2023, to November 1, 2027.

#### Procurement Information

* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: Lowest Price

#### Trade Agreements

* The procurement is covered under the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP).

#### Contracting Entity and End-User

* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User**: Department of Fisheries and Oceans (DFO)

#### Contact Information

* **Contact Name**: Ioana Novac, (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [ioana.novac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:ioana.novac@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
